topics.body:
"@twistedmetalero":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53704f04636872394d080000#post_53704f04636872394d080000
Pretty sure that first one is a poe, but I feel an urge to compare it to myself due to my natural human solipsism.

Longish hair- Nope, I keep my hair short because I look like a lumberjack clown with long hair.

Soul patch- actually a magnificent goatee

Vacant Stare- ok, I'll give you that one. But I think that's more due to the mind altering chemicals I ingest. 

Slouches- Because it lets me avoid hitting my head on low hanging things.

Idle hands- They're not idle at all! For instance right now I'm typing and masturbating.

What has it got in it's nasty little pockets? I'm sorry, but if you can't guess you'll just have to show me the way out.

Chain- I know I have a wallet chain somewhere, but I never wear it.

Comfortable footwear- Do cowboy boots count?

Baggy pants- Only because I lost weight. Fact: Theists hate people who lose weight.
